message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with distributed storage codes, which are typically studied in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Distributed Computing (cs.DC) sub-categories. The use of regenerating codes also involves network coding, which is studied in the Networked Systems (cs.NI) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper presents explicit constructions of codes, which is a topic in the Computational Complexity (cs.CC) sub-category.
